message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe you might find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $130.  What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of offering $120 for it. Can you consider this price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. While $120 is a bit lower than I'd hoped for, I'm willing to come down to $125. I believe this product will bring you a lot of value.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to go up to $123 for the product. Can you meet me halfway?
